message.body: Hey. Sorry to have to ask, but do you think we can go to the movies tomorrow instead of Friday? Since we had a delay on Tuesday, my original Thursday in-class exam turned into a Friday online exam that I have to take before 11:59 pm. Let me know!!

Hey! I can go whenever :) We can definitely go tomorrow. But since you have your exam on Friday, do you want to have tomorrow to study too? We can go on Saturday or anytime over the weekend if you want?
If it's all the same to you, can we go tomorrow for the 6:50 show? I needed the weekend to study for microbio
Awww I'm sorry :( of course! I'm excited!!! We finally get to this this elusive movie!
I know!!! Do you want to eat there too?
Sure! I'm down for anywhere. Since we're going at that time, I'm sure we'll have our pick of places to eat :)))))
Ohhh I wonder what Cafe Bravo or Philly's Gourmet Cafe serves!
I'm going to try to find a menu online. Hopefully it's just not coffee and muffins hahah.
Haha. Me too! But thanks for going tomorrow!
Oh my j no problem! I'm looking forward to hanging out!!!
Me too!!!! So what time would you want to get together? Sorry for the 20 questions.
No worries. I want to plan out the day too because I'm taking my mom to her doctor's appointment tomorrow too. I hope to get home by 5 at the latest. Do you want to eat before or after?
Probably before. I have to get up at 6:30 the next morning.
Good nuff. There doesn't seem to be restaurants so I think we'll be okay. Right?
Okay. I'm going to try to get to South Philly by 5:30 and we'll get there by 6 and have 50 minutes to eat?
I think so! I don't think having enough time to get food will be a problem.
